textBeforeTable: phpinfo() //--> hr {width: 600px; background-color: #cccccc; border: 0px; height: 1px; color: #000000;} img {float: right; border: 0px;} .vr {background-color: #cccccc; text-align: right; color: #000000;} .v {background-color: #cccccc; color: #000000;} .h {background-color: #9999cc; font-weight: bold; color: #000000;} .e {background-color: #ccccff; font-weight: bold; color: #000000;} .p {text-align: left;} h2 {font-size: 125%;} h1 {font-size: 150%;} td, th { border: 1px solid #000000; font-size: 75%; vertical-align: baseline;} .center th { text-align: center !important; } .center table { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: left;} .center {text-align: center;} table {border-collapse: collapse;} a:hover {text-decoration: underline;} a:link {color: #000099; text-decoration: none; background-color: #ffffff;} pre {margin: 0px; font-family: monospace;} body, td, th, h1, h2 {font-family: sans-serif;} body {background-color: #ffffff; color: #000000;}
